body.p:
Boonville Ky July 8th 1861
B McGoffin Esqr governer of The Commonwealth of Kentucky

your petitioner respectfully represent to your excellency that at the last May term of the owsley circuit court a fine was assessed by the verdict a Jury against Samuel A Chastain upon the under an indictment against him for carrying consealed a pistol $50 Your petitioners beg leave to represent that Chastain is an invalid ^(almost)^ from birth having but one leg a very crooked bad one at that and it bound to make his way through on sticks this a short time previous it is true he carried the pistol but it is also true that he had been violently assaulted on the street with abusive threatening and menacing language calculated to put greatly erritate Chastain if not enduce Just him in fear of bodily harm that it s ^so^ much erritated Chastain he fell into the failing of drinking too much and in this condition he exhibited the pistol they state he is a good orderly citizen comonly and is not in the habit of Carrying weapons unnecessarily it is the desire of all who know him that the fine be remitted that it is certainly a case to warrant the interposition of your excellencys clemency

H F Hensley
A. Bowman
Austin ^his X mark^ Palmer
N J. Hughs
E Winn
John C. Cole
J. C. Hensley
T. H. Carson
Thos Munsell
W Williams

Hiram Mcgrew

Tinsley Combs

Isaac N. Cardwell
Aly Ledford
Henry Moor
James Cole
H C Smith
A B Gillent

Dear Govenor
I think this Petition embraces the wishes of all our orderly citizens Chtain has refraind from Liquor and I think you will ceartainly remit this fine
E. B. Treadway Sheff
S A Chastain says the statements contained in the foregoing Petition are true

Sworn to before me by S A Chastain
July 8th 1861

att Wm S Hurst D. C.
D. B. Capp clk O. C. C

The Petitioner Saml Chastain is a very Bad cripple, requires two sticks to walk. He is at least excusable for carrying weapons, He was fined $50 -- I have remited my part in consequence of His condition -- would like for you to remit for comlth.

Owsley Cir. Ct
$50 } Weapons
S. A Chastain
